project_overview.name: Minimal BRD for brdynamo
project_overview.objective: Simple products API for testing backend generator
project_overview.business_context: Testing backend generator capabilities with a basic products API.

functional_requirements.title: List products
functional_requirements.description: Retrieve a list of all products.
workflow_steps: Receive GET request at /api/products
Query the database for all products
Return the list of products in JSON format

functional_requirements.title: Get product by id
functional_requirements.description: Retrieve a specific product by its ID.
workflow_steps: Receive GET request at /api/products/{id}
Extract product ID from the URL
Query the database for the product with the given ID
Return the product details in JSON format
Return error if product not found

functional_requirements.title: Create product
workflow_steps: Receive POST request at /api/products
Parse product details from the request body (JSON)
Validate product details
Create a new product in the database
Return the ID of the newly created product

functional_requirements.title: Update product
workflow_steps: Receive PUT request at /api/products/{id}
Extract product ID from the URL
Parse updated product details from the request body (JSON)
Validate updated product details
Update the product in the database
Return success/failure status

functional_requirements.title: Delete product
workflow_steps: Receive DELETE request at /api/products/{id}
Extract product ID from the URL
Delete the product from the database
Return success/failure status

api_details.request_parameters: JSON body with product details (name, price, stock)
id (UUID), JSON body with updated product details (name, price, stock)
